runPmdTest

protected final net.sourceforge.pmd.Report runPmdTest(Class<?> singleClassUnderTest,
                                                      net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.java.rule.AbstractJavaRule ruleUnderTest)
Runs PMD on the given single class with the given single rule.

Parameters:
singleClassUnderTest - Single class to run PMD on.
ruleUnderTest - Single PMD Rule to apply.
Returns:
The PMD Report, containing the results of the PMD execution.

runPmdTest

protected final net.sourceforge.pmd.Report runPmdTest(Class<?>[] classesUnderTest,
                                                      net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.java.rule.AbstractJavaRule ruleUnderTest)
Runs PMD on the given classes with the given single rule.

Parameters:
classesUnderTest - Classes to run PMD on.
ruleUnderTest - Single PMD Rule to apply.
Returns:
The PMD Report, containing the results of the PMD execution.

runPmdTest

protected final net.sourceforge.pmd.Report runPmdTest(URL[] javaFilesUnderTest,
                                                      net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.java.rule.AbstractJavaRule ruleUnderTest)
This method can be used if the Java file to parse contains potentially compiler breaking code and should not be on the default compile paths of AludraTest.

Parameters:
javaFilesUnderTest - Resource URLs of the files to test, e.g. retrieved from Classloader.
ruleUnderTest - Single PMD Rule to apply.
Returns:
The PMD Report, containing the results of the PMD execution.
